name: 8th International Conference on Research in Education
content: The 8th International Conference on Research in Education, 28-30 June 2024 in Amsterdam, Netherlands aims to bring together academia, researchers, and scholars to exchange information and share experiences and research results about all aspects of specialized and interdisciplinary fields. This education conference 2024 provides an opportunity for all to network, share ideas and present their research to a worldwide community. Discussion on the latest innovations, trends and practical concerns, and challenges faced in these fields are also encouraged. We are delighted to announce that the event has established a great and friendly community of multinational researchers who are fond of sharing their common experiences In this regard, the scientific and executive committees of the Conference kindly invite all professors, researchers, and executive officials to submit, individually or in partnership with other researchers, their valuable articles comprising the latest scientific and research findings on the main or related themes and topics of the international conference on education to the Conference Secretariat.
